name: Decorous Harmony
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yun Jin, equip this card.
After Yun Jin equips this card, immediately use Cliffbreaker's Banner.
When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, Flying Cloud Flag Formation will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Yun Jin in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1607]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1607] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16073]</color>.
When $[A1607], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116073]</color> will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have $[A1607] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Yun Jin</color>, equip this card.
After Yun Jin equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Cliffbreaker's Banner</color>.
When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color> will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Yun Jin in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
